title: Remove principal ID field from user creation form

requirements.text: Remove the principal ID input field from the CreateUserDialog form in frontend/src/components/admin/CreateUserDialog.tsx

quotes: please remove the field from the user creating page

acceptanceCriteria: Principal ID field is no longer visible in the user creation dialog
Form validation no longer requires principal ID input
User creation form only contains name, username, hotel assignment, contact info, password, and role fields

requirements.text: Update the useCreateUser mutation hook in frontend/src/lib/backend/users.ts to automatically generate or handle principal ID server-side when creating users, removing the principal ID parameter from the mutation input

quotes: please remove the field from the user creating page or make it very simple

acceptanceCriteria: useCreateUser mutation no longer accepts principal ID as a parameter
Backend createUser method automatically assigns or generates principal ID
User creation succeeds without client-provided principal ID

requirements.text: Update the backend createUser method in backend/main.mo to automatically generate a unique principal ID for new users instead of accepting it as a parameter

quotes: what ever the format i type the principal id it is not accepting

acceptanceCriteria: Backend createUser function no longer requires principal ID parameter
System automatically generates valid principal ID for each new user
Generated principal IDs are unique and valid for the system

constraints: Do not change existing user records or their principal IDs
Maintain compatibility with existing authentication and authorization flows
Preserve all other user creation fields (name, username, hotel, contact, password, role)
nonGoals: Altering the principal ID validation library (@dfinity/principal)
